[@microsoft/fast-element](../fast-element/index.html) &gt; [SpliceStrategySupport](../fast-element.splicestrategysupport/index.html)

## SpliceStrategySupport variable

Indicates what level of feature support the splice strategy provides.

**Signature:**

```typescript
SpliceStrategySupport: Readonly<{
    readonly reset: 1;
    readonly splice: 2;
    readonly optimized: 3;
}>
```
